Requests For CDs (ask for monsters to be posted)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Laboratory: Technical Research On The Monster Rancher CD Read Process: Subcode Data Files: Monster Rancher 3 Archive: Requests For CDs (ask for monsters to be posted)
Please remember that subcode from PSX game discs does not seem to work in MR3. Also, many rares are gotten from DVDs, and DVD based games. There is no way to extract data from DVDs or PS2 games, so don't bother requesting DVDs or DVD based games.
Read The Master List Of Rares Carefully Before Requesting Code To Be Posted!
